com.caucho.util
Class ByteBuffer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.caucho.util.ByteBuffer
public final class ByteBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

A variable-length byte buffer, similar to a character buffer.

The byte buffer is unsynchronized.
